=== Legality in the United Kingdom ===
=== Legality in the United Kingdom ===
â
Sexual penetration with a corpse was made illegal under the [[Sexual Offences Act 2003]]. The Government is also considering criminalising possession of depictions of necrophilia. This is defined as depictions of "sexual interference with a human corpse" (as opposed to only penetration), and would cover "depictions which appear to be real acts" as well as actual scenes (see also [[extreme pornography]]). quote- Dr. Nikki Rosing
+
Sexual penetration with a corpse was made illegal under the [[Sexual Offences Act 2003]]. The Government is also considering criminalising possession of depictions of necrophilia. This is defined as depictions of "sexual interference with a human corpse" (as opposed to only penetration), and would cover "depictions which appear to be real acts" as well as actual scenes (see also [[extreme pornography]]). quote- Dr. Nikki Rosing, author: "Hey Diddle Diddle, I Diddle Dead People".
